SRP.Q: In 1962, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Direct-to-Consumer relative to Electronics Retailers?
SRP.A: In 1962, Direct-to-Consumer is {below} Electronics Retailers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Electronics Retailers, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1957 relative to that in 1958 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Electronics Retailers, the data point in 1957 is {above} and to the {left} of the data point in 1958.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Electronics Retailers. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(5 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1957, 1958, 1959, 1960, 1963}.
